DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Current Medical Practice Efficacy Safety Ranibizumab 0.5mg Diabetic Patients Presenting Visual Impairment Due Macular Edema
DOC.criteria: Male female patient > 18 year age sign informed consent Patients Type 1 Type 2 diabetes mellitus ( accord ADA WHO guideline ) HbA1c 10.0 % screening ( Visit 1 ) . Patients diet , exercise , and/or pharmacological treatment diabetes .
